concept.title: File Processing Metadata
concept.shortdesc: File Tail logs information information about file processing, such as a file name and time it started or stopped processing a file.

conbody.p: File Tail originfile processing metadatametadatafrom processing files (File Tail)File Tail passes the information to the pipeline through the metadata node. To retain this information for review, connect the metadata node to the pipeline or a standard destination. If you do not require this information, connect the metadata node to the Trash destination.

The file processing metadata includes the following fields:
fileName Name of the file.
inode Index node information for the file.
time Time that the event occurred.
event Processing event. START indicates that File Tail started processing the specified file. END indicates that File Tail completed processing the contents of the file.
conbody.note: Note that file names can change when the server archives data and renames archived files. The inode most reliably identifies a file.
